heading: HR00406
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO STRONGLY URGE THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH TO CONDUCT A THOROUGH INFORMATION AND EDUCATION CAMPAIGN TO REVISIT THE ADVANTAGES AND STRENGTHEN THE CONFIDENCE ON VACCINATION AS A PREVENTIVE MEASURE ON VARIOUS DISEASES SUCH AS POLIO, DENGUE, MEASLES, AND DIPHTHERIA
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2019-10-02
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00406
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO STRONGLY URGE THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH TO CONDUCT A THOROUGH INFORMATION AND EDUCATION CAMPAIGN TO REVISIT THE ADVANTAGES AND STRENGTHEN THE CONFIDENCE ON VACCINATION AS A PREVENTIVE MEASURE ON VARIOUS DISEASES SUCH AS POLIO, DENGUE, MEASLES, AND DIPHTHERIA
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.
DATE FILED : 2019-10-01
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH ON 2019-10-02
